verbose_text: This was in contrast to studies by Tang and Shay [XREF_BIBR] who demonstrated that treatment of 3T3-L1 adipocytes over 5-10 minutes with ZnCl 2 increased tyrosine phosphorylation of the IR-beta subunit of the insulin receptor and enhanced the transport of glucose in the absence of insulin through the PI-3-kinase signal transduction pathway.
evidence: tyrosine phosphorylation of the IR-beta subunit
